body.p: Hangul joins the list of languages the GWN is translated into, and the Gentoo Forums have officially introduced subforums this week, reports the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The Future zone sheds some light on Portage development, a reminder for the European Gentoo conference and other news complete the news coverage of this week's edition, with a featured developer on top and the usual GLSAs and bugzilla statistics. Enjoy this week's GWN!
